title: BLACK COLOUR BEST SUITED FOR NATIONAL DRESS, SAYS FORMER CHIEF JUSTICE
content: October 21, 2010: Former chief justice Sarath N. Silva says that in an era where human rights are fast disappearing, it is most appropriate to wear the national dress in black colour. The former chief justice expressed these views addressing a function in Anuradhapura today to felicitate Attorney at Law Karunaratne Herath for the service…
